official-title.#text:
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act
		  of 1968 to enhance the use of Juvenile Accountability Block Grants for programs
		  to prevent and address occurrences of bullying and to reauthorize the Juvenile
		  Accountability Block Grants program.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Juvenile Accountability Block Grant
			 Reauthorization and the Bullying Prevention and Intervention Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Bullying
			 prevention and intervention programs; Reauthorization of juvenile
			 accountability block grants

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended to read
			 as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Paragraph (13) of section 1801(b) of the Omnibus Crime
			 Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1801/ss:b/p:13

text.#text:
establishing and maintaining
				accountability-based programs that are designed to enhance school safety, which
				programs may include research-based bullying prevention, cyberbullying
				prevention, and gang prevention programs, as well as intervention programs
				regarding
				bullying;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that the use of best practices is encouraged for all activities
			 for which grants under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
part R of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe
			 Streets Act of 1968
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/t:I/pt:R

text.#text:
It is the sense of
			 the

quote.#text:
and such funds as may be necessary for each of fiscal years
			 2014 through 2018

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by inserting before the period at the end the
			 following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1810/ss:a

header.#text:
Reauthorization
			 of Juvenile Accountability Block Grants

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2585 IH: Juvenile Accountability Block Grant Reauthorization and the Bullying Prevention and Intervention Act of 2013
